text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The Tracen Meet kicks off in a few<n>days.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, did you hear? Pretty much<n>everyone dropped out of
Group 10 for<n>the 2000-meter turf race after they<n>heard
about Brian entering.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Right, right! That group is full of G1<n>racers now. I'm so glad I
got out in<n>time...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hmm... So that's what's goin' on.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Why d'you ask?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me you're gonna ask me<n>to drop out too.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Whatever the other racers do is none<n>of my business. I'm
no chicken!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Sure, Brian is one hell of a runner.<n>Calling her G1-class
doesn't even cut<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Plus, tons of folks are gonna be<n>watchin' the race. I know
the other<n>runners don't wanna damage their<n>reputation
right outta the gate.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But I'm not givin' up.
choice_data_list: Because giving up is lame, right?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Heh, that's right. I'm glad ya get me.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Cool racers like me don't back down<n>from a challenge!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, ya ready, Trainer? The<n>event'll be here before ya
know it, so<n>we better get workin'!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We focus all our efforts into training<n>for the next few days.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Finally, the day of the Tracen Meet<n>arrives.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Listen to the crowd going wild! Only<n>one racer can create
such a<n>reaction—the G1 star of Group 10...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: The fearsome beast—NaritaBrian!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: How noisy.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Damn... Talk about havin' a presence.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Getting cold feet all of a sudden? It's<n>okay if you want to
chicken out—I can<n>put in a word with the committee.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wha?! As if! Don't you dare!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna win. Just watch me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, I'm all eyes... Geez.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That's... an ambitious statement.<n>Does Vodka actually think
she can<n>beat Narita Brian?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Vodka's got potential... but nowhere<n>near that level...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The race officially kicks off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(I can do this! If I win against Brian...<n>That'd make me so
cool the track'd<n>freeze over!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Vodka has made her move! She's<n>smoothly accelerating
and making her<n>way up the group!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The race started off at a quick pace,<n>and I can see Vodka is
doing her best<n>to keep up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But as they approach the final<n>stretch...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (Crap... My vision... is getting blurry...)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Damn it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Game's over.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian makes her move! Look at<n>that speed! She's
cutting through the<n>pack and establishing her lead!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Daaaaamn it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Vodka's accelerating again, but the<n>gap is already
tremendous! Narita<n>Brian has put five—no, six lengths<n>
between her and second place!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I can't do it... She's too fast!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Impossible... There's no way...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian finishes in first! What an<n>amazing show of
power! What a<n>beautiful run we all just witnessed!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Unfortunately, Vodka finishes in fifth<n>place.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Vodka put up a good fight... but it was<n>reckless of her to
take on such a<n>challenge.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. If only she picked a different<n>group, she would've
easily been the<n>star of the show.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Whoa there! What're ya lookin' so<n>scary for, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's fine. There was nothing I could do<n>about it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm just... lame as hell...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I can even give her a word of<n>encouragement, Vodka
turns on her<n>heel and walks away.
